Key features of WHUKs Shared hosting plans:-
· Instant Account Activation
· Free Setup
· No Hidden Fees
· 30 Days Unconditional Money Back
· 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
· Servers housed at Tier IV datacenter
· 24x7x365 Real Time Free Support via. Email, Live Chat and Phone.

Why Choose WHUK?
At WHUK, we have a dedicated team of professionals for whom customer experience with our user interfaces and customer satisfaction is a priority.
· We offer numerous user friendly tools with our plans that give our customers utmost flexibility and varied choice.
· Tools offered include a choice of site builder, shopping carts, blogging tools, photo galleries and more.
· When you contact our team for any assistance through the Live Chat system or Phone, you'll be in touch with one of our agents almost instantly.
· We serve websites off servers that are of high configuration built on Dell PowerEdge chassis and backed by superior connectivity, which means your websites will be served from the best possible infrastructure with faster load times and almost no service interruptions.
· We are able to deliver extremely reliable service backed by many user friendly tools, and a great user experience; all of this at a price which does not cost the earth.

WHUK offers with uninterrupted customer support and 99.95% uptime guarantee along with ensuring the speed and smooth functioning of the website even during the high traffic times. These shared hosting packages are the best solutions for small and medium businesses. With all the features mentioned above and 24/7 pro-active monitoring, the shared hosting platform provided by WHUK is a complete value for money.

In case of any questions, you can approach our Sales Department through 24*7 Live chat, you can drop us an email at sales @ webhosting.uk.com or call us on the toll free number 0808-862-0890 / +44-191-303-8069.
